WorkItem.ClosedComment: I believe this issue is already resolved for 2.2.25. It was a side effect of old availability reporting and gem filtering.
WorkItem.Description:
I run optimizer and receive the following message:
Optimizer Warning
---------------------------
The following currently equipped items are not available
    Shoulderpads of the Monolith gemming/enchant is not available
    Conqueror's Nightsong Raiments gemming/enchant is not available
    Valorous Nightsong Legguards gemming/enchant is not available
    Valorous Nightsong Handgrips gemming/enchant is not available
Do you want to continue with the optimization?
----------------------------
I have the made the gems available in optimizer (Green diamond) and the enchants/equipment are also available.  I've also made sure that rare, epic, and JC gems are available in the gemming templates.  It only seems to happen for gear that has rare gems equipped.  When I choose the same piece of gear with an epic gem installed, the corresponding part of the message clears.
WorkItem.Summary: Currently equipped items are not available during Optimize
